hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sulaiman bin Amr bin Ahwas that his father said:I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saying during the Farewell pilgrimage: “No criminal commits a crime but he brings. (the punishment for that) upon himself. No father can bring punishment upon his son by his crime, and no son can bring punishment upon his father.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَجْنِي أَحَدٌ عَلَى أَحَدٍ
chapter.eng-name: No Criminal Can Bring Punishment Upon Anyone Else (For His Crime)
